Uses of Package
org.jivesoftware.spark.plugin

Packages that use org.jivesoftware.spark.plugin
org.jivesoftware.spark Provides the Managers used as the main entry points into the Spark client. 
org.jivesoftware.spark.component Provides useful Swing components that can be used within Spark. 
org.jivesoftware.spark.ui Provides support by providing all chat specific components, such as ChatRoom and ContactList. 
org.jivesoftware.spark.ui.conferences Contains Conference Room specific components, such as room browsers and helpful conference utilities. 
org.jivesoftware.spark.util Provides helpful utilities used for Spark.

Classes in org.jivesoftware.spark.plugin used by org.jivesoftware.spark
MetadataListener
           
Plugin
          The Plugin interface is the required implementation to have your Sparkplugs work within the Spark client.
PublicPlugin
           
 

Classes in org.jivesoftware.spark.plugin used by org.jivesoftware.spark.component
ContextMenuListener
          The ContextMenuListener allows implementors to add their own menu items to the context menu associated with this listener.
